action_loop: 3. Choose Lead Stat (Sets Bonus & Resource Cost)
4. Set Trail Stat (Sets Defense Modifier until next turn)

dice_mechanic.advantage: 2d20 (Keep High) - Triggered by Mastery or Tactical Edge

HP.name: Body Health (Meat)
HP.description: Physical health representing muscle, bone, and blood. Structural integrity.

CMP.name: Mind Health (Composure)
CMP.description: Mental health representing sanity, fear, and focus under pressure. Mental stability.

injury_table.consequences: Cosmetic scar, light bruising, momentary shock.
Staggered for 1 round, minor bleed (-1 HP/turn).
Severed Limb, Internal Bleeding, Mind Fracture.

trauma_categories.physical_causes: HP Damage. Fatigue, hunger, blunt force, muscle tears.
trauma_categories.mental_causes: CMP Damage. Horrifying sights, stress/fear, social defeat.

economy_rules.loadout_capacity: SP (Stamina) and FP (Focus) act as active Loadout Capacity and Action Currency.
economy_rules.maintenance_cost: Weapons, Armor, and modular Spells have a Maintenance Cost that reduces maximum SP/FP while equipped.
economy_rules.debt_mechanic: If you perform an action that costs more SP/FP than you have, you automatically take the difference as Direct HP/CMP Damage (overexertion/burnout) and must roll for an injury immediately.

skills.name: Aggressive
skills.effect: Advantage on damage vs Shields/Heavy Armor.

skills.name: Calculated
skills.effect: On Advantage hit, attacker chooses enemy's Injury Resistance stat.

skills.name: Patient
skills.effect: Advantage on hit if user Defended/Yielded last turn.

skills.name: Intimidating
skills.effect: Solid Hit forces Disadvantage on target's next Social/Resolve action.

skills.name: Deception
skills.effect: Deals minor chip CMP damage even on a Miss.

skills.name: Relentless
skills.effect: Advantage on Coercion rolls vs already Broken/Shaken targets.

fortify_physical.group_intent: Reduce HP Damage / Prevent Physical Injury

skills.name: Rooted
skills.effect: Immune to Prone/Forced Move; Advantage vs Disarm.

skills.name: Fluid
skills.effect: Successful defense converts Solid Hit into a Graze.

skills.name: Dueling
skills.effect: Winning a Clash grants Advantage on next Assault action.

skills.name: Confidence
skills.effect: Advantage on Social defense rolls while at Max CMP.

skills.name: Reasoning
skills.effect: Use Logic for Horrifying Sight defense instead of Willpower.

skills.name: Cavalier
skills.effect: Nat 20 Defense deals 1d4 CMP damage to attacker.

skills.name: Skirmish
skills.effect: Removes Disadvantage for firing within 5ft of enemies.

skills.name: Precise
skills.effect: Spend 1 FP for Advantage on Critical Injury rolls.

skills.name: Thrown/Tossed
skills.effect: On hit, target rolls vs Staggered status.

suppression_mental.group_intent: Deal CMP Damage / Area Control from range

skills.name: Predict
skills.effect: Declare hex; enemy entering must roll CMP or stop moving.

skills.name: Impose
skills.effect: Enemies in range suffer Disadvantage on Initiative actions.

skills.name: Imply
skills.effect: Target has Disadvantage on Offense if they don't move out of LoS.

skills.name: Alter
skills.effect: Advantage on rolls to destroy cover or create Difficult Terrain.

skills.name: Utilize
skills.effect: Use environment to gain Advantage on next Fortify action.

skills.name: Introduce
skills.effect: Spend 1 SP to give ally shield/cover +1 Durability.

skills.name: Command
skills.effect: Ally may swap their Lead/Trail stats immediately for free.

skills.name: Exploit
skills.effect: If enemy is Staggered, user may move turn order to act next.

skills.name: Tactics
skills.effect: If top of turn order, all allies gain +5ft Move Speed.

skills.name: First Aid
skills.effect: Stitch wound as Move Action (Disadvantage) instead of Main.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.effect: Advantage on rolls to remove Bleeding or Poison status.

skills.name: Surgery
skills.effect: Only skill capable of removing Severe Injury scars.

skills.name: Self-Awareness
skills.effect: Spend 1 FP for Advantage to resist Mental Fractures.

skills.name: Detached
skills.effect: Ignore Disadvantage penalty for low CMP (<50%) for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mindfulness
skills.effect: Can perform Rally action on allies at range (15ft).

skills.name: Charge
skills.effect: Move 15ft in straight line for Advantage on next Assault.

skills.name: Flanking
skills.effect: No Free Attacks provoked when moving adjacent to enemies.

skills.name: Speed
skills.effect: Moving 2 turns in a row increases SPD by +10ft.

skills.name: Commitment
skills.effect: Advantage on Resolve rolls while adjacent to an enemy.

skills.name: Determined
skills.effect: Allies moving toward the user gain +5ft Move Speed.

skills.name: Outsmart
skills.effect: Retreat without losing Initiative on next round.
